name: Leap-xslt
tagline: Repository containing XSLT for the Livingstone-online Enrichment and Access Project
body:
### LEAP-XSLT Repository
This is the LEAP-XSLT Repository for XSLT mostly written by @jamescummings hosted using the gh-pages branch.

This is just here so we can point directly at the XSLT it contains, etc.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
